explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the development of an automatic expert model using a rule extraction based approach, which involves machine learning techniques.
explanations.classification: The paper mentions that the Hyper Rectangular Composite Neural Networks (HRCNNs) yield an 80.6% successful classification rate, indicating the use of classification methods.
explanations.neural network: The paper specifically mentions the use of Hyper Rectangular Composite Neural Networks (HRCNNs) as part of the model, which is a type of neural network.
